title: Walmart’s bestselling $66 laundry rack is only $36
content:
TheStreet aims to feature only the best products and services. If you buy something via one of our links, we may earn a commission.

Why we love this deal

Doing laundry in a small apartment or dorm is a challenge. Even if you have a portable washing machine, going without a dryer or a dedicated space to air-dry delicates makes things even more difficult. Giant drying racks eat up precious space, so having something compact that folds away easily is a must. Right now, Walmart has a great deal on its bestselling collapsible laundry rack that's absolutely perfect for small spaces.

The is just $36 for a limited time, which is a 45% discount from the usual $66 price. If you need a reliable laundry rack that won't give out under the weight of your towels but also doesn't take up a ton of room, don't miss out on this "amazingly steady" while it's on sale.

Why do shoppers love it?

This 3-tier, stainless steel rack measures 39.3 inches high, 29.33 inches wide, and 14.96 inches deep when fully expanded. It has a telescopic design so you can adjust the width from 17.3 to 29.33 inches, depending on how much space you're working with or what all you need to dry.

It can hold quite a bit — up to 15 clothing items, two pillows, or 22 towels — all without snagging delicate fabrics or collapsing under the weight of wet fabric. When your things are dry, the rack collapses flat to slide under beds or between washers and dryers, making it ideal for apartments, tiny homes, or RVs. "It collapses to a very small and easy-to-store size," one reviewer raved.

Non-slip feet and a secure locking mechanism ensure stability. "I especially like the feet," a satisfied shopper shared. There's also no assembly required, either. Just open it up and it's ready to go.
• Dimensions: This drying rack measures 39.3 inches high, 29.33 inches wide, and 14.96 inches deep when expanded fully.
• Capacity: Holds up to 15 clothing items, two pillows, or 22 towels.
• Is it collapsible?: Yes.

Shoppers are impressed with this laundry rack's "excellent quality and usability," noting that it's "sturdy and easy to use." One shopper shared that it's "sturdy enough for rugs."

"I love that I can change the size according to what I’m trying to hang," another reviewer said.

At just $36, the is a can't-miss deal. Its "smart, space-saving design" makes it a great value, so hurry to Walmart and grab yours before the price goes back up.
summary: Walmart's bestselling collapsible laundry rack, priced at $36 for a limited time, is a 45% discount from the usual $66 price. The 3-tier stainless steel rack measures 39.3 inches high, 29.33 inches wide, and 14.96 inches deep when fully expanded. It can hold up to 15 clothing items, two pillows, or 22 towels without collapsing. The rack collapses flat to be placed under beds or between washers and dryers, making it ideal for small spaces. Shoppers are particularly impressed with its compact design and ability to adjust the size depending on the need for room.
shortSummary: Walter's bestselling $66 laundry rack, featuring telescopic design, is a great deal for small spaces, with sturdy storage and easy-to-use use.

argos_summary: Article highlights a Walmart deal on a collapsible 3‑tier stainless steel laundry rack, now $36 (45% off the $66 regular price). The rack expands to 39.3″ tall, 29.33″ wide, 14.96″ deep and can hold up to 15 clothing items, two pillows, or 22 towels, with a telescopic width adjustment from 17.3″ to 29.33″. It collapses flat for easy storage under beds or between appliances, features non‑slip feet and a locking mechanism, and requires no assembly. Shoppers praise its sturdiness, space‑saving design, and versatility for apartments, tiny homes, or RVs.
